text: Guma, ana Zuda guma guar, anan ndavar vhee gum anan ndɨkndɨgi, ana khueŋ kaŋgiri, ana Fhe Bakɨmen guma guar ma. Ana vhɨra mba won fooŋgi ndɨkndɨk, ana ndava vhee gum ndɨkndɨgar kɨri. Ana mba Fhe Bakɨme suaŋgi tɨvi, mbe nta khergi, ana ntara nzuav ki fhuvara, ana Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar nduara mba tɨvir ana khɨvi. Mba khesharigi guma, ana gumgi gu mbigi nɨman zɨ bakɨme ndi fhuvara. Ana Fhe Bakɨme nɨman ana zɨ bakɨme ki.
